sentences.sContent: As a child, she’d been taught never to speak to strange men.
sentences.sCn: 她从小就受到教育绝对不要和陌生男人说话。

sentences.sContent: ...they were strange to the europeans when first imported from west Africa...
...But a look at the strange variations in tuition reveals that the choice about which college to attend doesn’t come down merely to dollars and cents...

phrases.pCn: [主方言]表现得不友好，表现得令人吃惊

words.tran: 奇怪地；奇妙地；不可思议地
陌生；冷淡；[高能] 奇异性

trans.tranOther: not familiar because you have not been there before or met the person before
